text: 6:18 Matyu 26:41; Luk 18:1; Rom 12:12; Kolosi 4:2; 1 Tesalonika 5:17; 1 Timoti 2:1Ia bizir kabar amuva, egh God ko mɨkɨm. Egh a ian akurvaghsɨ ia an azangsɨgh. Ia zurara, Godɨn Duam ian navibagh inivtɨ, ia God ko mɨkɨm. Egh angamɨra ikɨ gan, egh dughiatam God ko mɨgeir arazim ataghɨraghan markɨ, egh zurara Godɨn gumazamiziba bar me bagh a ko mɨkɨm.
